title: rg doesn't stop after first match when -q is used
body:
Example:

```
$ seq 100000 > t
$ time grep -q 1 t

real    0m0.003s
user    0m0.000s
sys     0m0.000s
$ time rg -q 1 t

real    0m0.139s
user    0m0.124s
sys     0m0.012s
$ time grep -q a t

real    0m0.003s
user    0m0.000s
sys     0m0.004s
$ rg -q a t

real    0m0.017s
user    0m0.008s
sys     0m0.008s
```
